Item.sqlserver_body: create procedure [schedulingLogSp] @callerSpName varchar(64), @dbName varchar(64) = NULL, @inParams varchar(512) = null, @outParams varchar(512) = null, @additionalInfo NVARCHAR(MAX) = NULL AS BEGIN if not exists (select * from sysobjects where [name]='MM_LogTable' and xtype='U') begin create table [innovator].[MM_LogTable] ( rowNum int, callerSpName varchar(64), dbName varchar(64), callTime datetime, inParams varchar(512), outParams varchar(512), additionalInfo NVARCHAR(MAX) ) end declare @rowNum int, @callTime datetime select @rowNum = count(*) from MM_LogTable set @rowNum = 1 + @rowNum set @callTime = GETDATE() insert into [innovator].[MM_LogTable] (rowNum, callerSpName, dbName, callTime, inParams, outParams, additionalInfo) values (@rowNum, @callerSpName, @dbName, @callTime, @inParams, @outParams, @additionalInfo) END
Item.name: schedulingLogSp
